name: Ping Pong Master
description:
A colorful PingPong match that would draw your attention!

Move the racket freely with your finger.
Hit the ball back and forth across the table to keep up the rally.
Try to catch the ball right at the center of your racket in order to get bonus scores.
The movement and the speed of the ball can be very unpredictable.
If you miss the ball, Game Over.

Now, let’s see how many score you can reach!
